comment.author: 82862615@N00
comment._content: The "National Electric Light Association Bulletin of 1911" lists these men as high ranking members. President - W. W. Freeman (Brooklyn, NY) Second Vice President - Frank M. Tait (Dayton, OH) Executive Committee - Frank W. Frueauff (New York, NY), John F. Gilchrist (Chicago,IL) Progress Committee Chairman - T. Commeford. Martin (New York, NY) The organization appears to have been an early, nation-wide electrical industry organization based in New York. This bulletin is 800 pages filled with news, technical instructions and even an FAQ with questions like "What's the best way to revive a shocked worker?"
